code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import Xicon from'./close-icon.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Notification=function Notification(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{float:'right;'},"aria-label":"Close",onClick:function onClick(){return console.log('Close button has been clicked');},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Xicon,alt:"Close",style:{height:'20px',width:'20px'}})})]});};export default Notification;
